评论概述: Perfect Zhitunemi Women's Steampunk Skirt Ruffle High Low Outfits
评论详情: Design and Style The high-low hemline is the standout feature, offering a dramatic flair that instantly elevates any outfit. The ruffled layers and lace detailing are beautifully done, giving the skirt a vintage, steampunk-inspired aesthetic. It pairs wonderfully with corsets or fitted tops, making it versatile for costume events or themed parties. The skirt is flattering for various body types, especially for plus-size women, as it accentuates curves without feeling restrictive.  Fit and Comfort This skirt is designed with comfort in mind. The elastic waistband provides a secure and adjustable fit, making it easy to wear for extended periods. It’s lightweight yet sturdy enough to hold its shape, so you can move freely without worrying about it sagging or shifting awkwardly.  Material Quality The fabric is a blend of polyester and lace, offering a decent balance between durability and aesthetics. While it looks elegant, the material feels a bit synthetic and might not be as breathable as natural fabrics. However, this is typical for costume-style clothing and doesn’t detract significantly from its overall appeal.  Performance Whether for cosplay, Halloween, or themed events, this skirt is a showstopper. It’s versatile enough to use in various looks—pair it with a corset for a steampunk vibe or a flowy blouse for a pirate-inspired ensemble. It holds up well during wear but might require some ironing or steaming to maintain its ruffled appearance after unpacking.  Value for Money For its price, the Zhitunemi Steampunk Skirt offers excellent value. It’s a budget-friendly option for creating intricate, themed outfits without sacrificing style. However, it’s more suited for occasional wear rather than everyday use due to the synthetic fabric.  Pros Stylish and versatile design Flattering for all body types Comfortable elastic waistband Affordable price point  Cons Fabric feels synthetic Requires occasional steaming/ironing to maintain appearance  The Zhitunemi Women's Steampunk Skirt is a fantastic addition to any costume wardrobe. It’s stylish, flattering, and affordable, making it a great choice for anyone looking to stand out at themed events. While the material isn’t premium, it delivers more than enough value for its price. Highly recommended for cosplay and costume enthusiasts!

评论概述: Don't go by waist size!  It's bigger. than size chart says.
评论详情: Color true to photo (Purple).  Comfortable.  Lightweight but not transparent.  I got the 5 to 6 x size.  The size chart says the waist is 34 to 36 inches.  My waist is 42 inches and it fits perfectly with not much need to stretch.  And yes it does arrive wrinkled.  But I put it in a hot dryer with a wet towel for about 10 minutes to steam it.  It came out less wrinkled, not perfect, but enough so that I'm not going through the aggrivation of trying to iron it.
Not the deep red as pictured but had to wear for event it was ordered for. Thin but not see through.

评论概述: True to size. Color Off. Thin fabric.
评论详情: The beige color is more of a pale, soft buttery yellow. (Not the darker reddish beige shown in the photo.) The fabric is very thin and dark undergarments would show through. The M/L waist stretches from about 28 inches to 39 inches so it should fit a medium or large. I am 5ft 5in and 145 lbs and it fits perfectly. Hits right at the ankles in the back. The front can be adjusted from below the knees to almost "all the way up" so it's versatile. Could worn on its own or as a Renaissance style overskirt or underskirt. Definitely thin costume material ... would not be suitable for a serious or formal event.

I ordered a size XL / 2X and it fits like a Large.  Not worth the $29  Definitely feels like something I would get from Temu.  And the back seam is all messed up. It is partially sewed correct and then for a few inches, sewed onto additional fabric on the skirt.  Not worth it .
